Darklings:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
Darklings:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage randomizes between 7 and 11 at the start of each turn.
Darklings:Chomp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage randomizes between 9 and 13 at the start of each turn.

Darklings:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
Darklings:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: Each Darkittyn gains !M! Strength each turn.

Darklings:DarkStrike.NAME: Dark Strike
Darklings:DarkStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects Dark Strike !M! times. NL

Darklings:SporeCloud.NAME: Spore Cloud
Darklings:SporeCloud.DESCRIPTION: Anytime a Darkittyn is killed, apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

Darklings:Smash.NAME: Smash
Darklings:Smash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Darklings:Puncture.NAME: Puncture
Darklings:Puncture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

Darklings:Protect.NAME: Protect
Darklings:Protect.DESCRIPTION: A random Darkittyn gains !B! Block. NL

Darklings:AngryClaw.NAME: Angry Claw
Darklings:AngryClaw.DESCRIPTION: All Darkittyns gain !M! Strength whenever they take damage.

Darklings:UltimateBlast.NAME: Ultimate Blast
Darklings:UltimateBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL End your turn.

Darklings:Bellow.NAME: Bellow
Darklings:Bellow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Each Darkitten gains !B! Block.
Darklings:Bellow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Each Darkitten gains !B! Block and !M! Strength.

Darklings:Thrash.NAME: Thrash
Darklings:Thrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Each Darkittyn gains !B! Block.

Darklings:Mug.NAME: Mug
Darklings:Mug.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
Darklings:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: On the their next hit, Darklings gain between !M! and !B! Block.

Darklings:GrowFuzz.NAME: Grow Fuzz
Darklings:GrowFuzz.DESCRIPTION: Teach [#7696F6]Casey to: NL Increase [#80F280]Anthony's Strength by !M!.

Darklings:Entangle.NAME: Entangle
Darklings:Entangle.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each attack in your hand, discard it and draw a card.

Darklings:Nap.NAME: Nap
Darklings:Nap.DESCRIPTION: All Darklings gain 8 block if you play no cards this turn.

Darklings:ShellShock.NAME: Shell Shock
Darklings:ShellShock.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:SkullBash.NAME: Skull Bash
Darklings:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Does !M!% more damage to Vulnerable enemies.

Darklings:GreatBellow.NAME: Great Bellow
Darklings:GreatBellow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy doesn't attack, Darklings gain !M! Strength.

Darklings:TwinSlam.NAME: Twin Slam
Darklings:TwinSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Gain !M! Strength for each thorn you have.

Darklings:Preparing.NAME: Preparing
Darklings:Preparing.DESCRIPTION: All Darklings do double damage until the end of next turn. NL Exhaust.
Darklings:Preparing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Darklings do double damage until the end of next turn.

Darklings:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
Darklings:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 6 times. NL Apply !M! Burn.

Darklings:Airborne.NAME: Airborne
Darklings:Airborne.DESCRIPTION: A random Darkittyn takes 1/2 damage the next time they are hit.
Darklings:Airborne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Both Darkittyns take 1/2 damage the next time they are hit.

Darklings:Heal.NAME: Heal
Darklings:Heal.DESCRIPTION: Heal a random Darkling !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:PerplexingGlare.NAME: Perplexing Glare
Darklings:PerplexingGlare.DESCRIPTION: Teach [#80F280]Anthony Confusion, giving him up to 3 random moves each turn.
Darklings:PerplexingGlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Teach [#80F280]Anthony Confusion, giving him up to 3 random improved moves each turn.

Darklings:ShellPlating.NAME: Shell Plating
Darklings:ShellPlating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 14 Plated Armor. NL A random Darkittyn gains 14 Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:MalleableSkin.NAME: Malleable Skin
Darklings:MalleableSkin.DESCRIPTION: Teach all Darkittyns to: NL Gain !B! Block.

Darklings:Hardifact.NAME: Hardifact
Darklings:Hardifact.DESCRIPTION: Block no longer expires at the start of your turn.
Darklings:Hardifact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block no longer expires at the start of your turn. NL Gain !M! artifact.

Darklings:HardenHit.NAME: Harden Hit
Darklings:HardenHit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All Darklings Gain !B! Block.

Darklings:Agonize.NAME: Agonize
Darklings:Agonize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M!% more damage if enemy is weak.

Darklings:StabbyStab.NAME: Stabby Stab
Darklings:StabbyStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Stab number increases each time this card is drawn.
Darklings:StabbyStab.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Apply a Wound. NL Stab number increases each time this card is drawn.

Darklings:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
Darklings:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove Debuffs from all Darklings. NL Gain !M! Strength.

Darklings:Forge.NAME: Forge
Darklings:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Teach [#7696F6]Casey to: NL All Darklings gain !M! Block at the end of their turn.

Darklings:MegaDebuff.NAME: Mega Debuff
Darklings:MegaDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Darklings:MegaDebuff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:FlameTackle.NAME: Flame Tackle
Darklings:FlameTackle.DESCRIPTION: Teach [#80F280]Anthony to: NL Deal !D! damage 2 times.

Darklings:HyperBeam.NAME: Hyper Beam
Darklings:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL End your turn.

Darklings:Stasis.NAME: Stasis
Darklings:Stasis.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards at the top of your deck.

Darklings:Explode.NAME: Explode
Darklings:Explode.DESCRIPTION: Teach both Darkittyns to: NL Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies. NL Darkittyn dies.

Darklings:Spines.NAME: Spines
Darklings:Spines.DESCRIPTION: All Darklings gain !M! thorns. NL Decreases by 1 each time used in combat.

Darklings:SnakeStrike.NAME: Snake Strike
Darklings:SnakeStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Darklings:SuicideAttack.NAME: Suicide Attack
Darklings:SuicideAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by HP missing. NL Deal !M! Wound.
Darklings:SuicideAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by twice HP missing. NL Deal !M! Wound.

Darklings:Constrict.NAME: Constrict
Darklings:Constrict.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !D! damage at the end of their turn.

Darklings:Shifting.NAME: Shifting
Darklings:Shifting.DESCRIPTION: Darklings gain !M! Strength a turn. NL Whenever they take damage, they lose that much Strength until the end of their turn.

Darklings:Fading.NAME: Fading
Darklings:Fading.DESCRIPTION: Darkittyn max hp is set to 999 for combat, but it dies at the end of !M! turns.

Darklings:NomNomNom.NAME: Nom Nom Nom
Darklings:NomNomNom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Every second turn, add an additional hit.

Darklings:Intrigible.NAME: Intrigible
Darklings:Intrigible.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, Intangible rotates between the three Darklings.

Darklings:Countdown.NAME: Countdown
Darklings:Countdown.DESCRIPTION: In 5 turns, add !M! Strength to ALL Darklings.

Darklings:Glare.NAME: Glare
Darklings:Glare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply Slow. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:CircleOfPower.NAME: Circle of Power
Darklings:CircleOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL All Darklings gain !M! Strength.

Darklings:SquareOfProtection.NAME: Square of Protection
Darklings:SquareOfProtection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL All Darklings gain !M! Plated Armor.

Darklings:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
Darklings:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Every 12 cards played, gain !M! Strength and end your turn.

Darklings:Reverberate.NAME: Reverberate
Darklings:Reverberate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times to ALL enemies.
Darklings:Reverberate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Slime.

Darklings:DarkEcho.NAME: Dark Echo
Darklings:DarkEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Void. NL Exhaust.

Darklings:Rebirth.NAME: Rebirth
Darklings:Rebirth.DESCRIPTION: Revive a dead Darkittyn to full HP. NL Exhaust.
